Fri, 08 Dec 2023 22:12:31 +0000 Up there with ghost chips, bugger and good on ya mate, togs, togs, undies has become one of the most enduring advertising phrases to enter our cultural lexicon since it was first uttered in a 2006 ad for Trumpet icecream. Photo / The Spinoff
